definition: abbr. for 青海[Qing1 hai3], Qinghai Province

sentences.chinese: 萬古長青的理性的紀念物。

sentences.english: They symbolize the everlasting friendship between the Chinese and Myanmar peoples and the Buddhist exchange between the two countries.
sentences.chinese: 象徵中泰兩國人民友誼和佛教交往萬古長青。

sentences.english: The great man's name will be ever new in the history.
sentences.chinese: 偉人的名字在歷史將萬古長青。

sentences.english: My love shall in my verse ever live young.
sentences.chinese: 我的愛在我詩裏將萬古長青。

sentences.english: Like pines and cypresses, his qualities are forever great.
sentences.chinese: 他高尚的品格好比蒼松翠柏，萬古長青。

sentences.english: Make it last forever friendship never ends.
sentences.chinese: 使之萬古長青的友誼永遠不會結束。

sentences.english: May the friendship between the peoples of (our) two countries last forever.
sentences.chinese: 祝兩國人民的友誼萬古長青。

sentences.english: Next year, my life will last forever.
sentences.chinese: 明年我的生命就可以萬古長青。
